messages.content:
Determine with the transcript wether the prospect wanted to be sent the SMS or not, or if the answer was an automated answer:{{3.transcript}}
And here you have the summary: {{3.summary}}
Just output Yes, No or Automation

#When to determine if it is Automation
Output Automation when the user says things like "7 0 8 9 2, press 1 to leave your message" or "the voice mail box you are calling hasn't been set up"

Example output:
Yes

mapper.body: Hey {{3.customer.name}}, I left you a voice message, please listen to it and if you think it will add value, here is my calendar link: https://calendly.com/alonsodeobaldia
